post_text: Tenant's rights: What do I need to Know about April rent and evictions in the COVID-19 crisis - check out facebook live with Southeast Louisiana Legal Services.
shared_text:
Southeast Louisiana Legal Services - SLLS was live.
March 31 at 1:00 PM ·

Tomorrow is April 1st and you can't pay your rent- what should you do? SLLS Staff Attorney Hannah Adams talks about the current state of evictions in Louisiana, what to do if your landlord illegally locks you out, and how to talk to your landlord about April rent.

post_text:
A couple of reminders:

Please email Monique at monique.dede@choiceschoolsno.org for access to our parent portal for grades, if your account has not been set up yet.

Starting Monday, March 30th, feeding sites will be closed every Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday. Meals on the Go will be served every Monday with enough meals for two days and every Wednesday with enough meals for three days. Services hours are from 9 AM to 12 PM. The site will be closed this Friday, March 27th.

Un par de recordatorios:

Envíe un correo electrónico a Monique a monique.dede@choiceschoolsno.org para acceder a nuestro portal de padres para ver las calificaciones de su estudiante, si su cuenta aún no se ha configurado.

A partir del lunes 30 de marzo, los sitios de alimentación estarán cerrados todos los martes, jueves y viernes. Las comidas para llevar se servirán todos los lunes con suficientes comidas para dos días y todos los miércoles con suficientes comidas para tres días. El horario de atención es de 9 a.m. a 12 p.m. El sitio estará cerrado este viernes 27 de marzo.

post_text:
Parent University is a parent education program that intends to build strong relationships between home and school, increase parent involvement, build a culture of caring, and support student success.

Parent University starts on Wednesday, August 28th at 4:30 p.m. We will be discussing the IEP process, after-school programs, attendance, and parents rights and responsibilities.
We will meet in the school cafeteria; snacks will be served.

Parent University es un programa de educación para padres que tiene la intención de construir relaciones sólidas entre el hogar y la escuela, aumentar la participación de los padres, construir una cultura de cuidado y apoyar el éxito de los estudiantes.

La Universidad para Padres comienza el miércoles 28 de agosto a las 4:30 p.m. Hablaremos sobre el proceso del IEP, los programas extracurriculares, la asistencia y los derechos y responsabilidades de los padres.
Nos encontraremos en la cafetería de la escuela; Se servirán bocadillos.
text:

We will meet in the school cafeteria; snacks will be served.

Parent University es un programa de educación para padres que tiene la intención de construir relaciones sólidas entre el hogar y la escuela, aumentar la participación de los padres, construir una cultura de cuidado y apoyar el éxito de los estudiantes.

La Universidad para Padres comienza el miércoles 28 de agosto a las 4:30 p.m. Hablaremos sobre el proceso del IEP, los programas extracurriculares, la asistencia y los derechos y responsabilidades de los padres.
Nos encontraremos en la cafetería de la escuela; Se servirán bocadillos.

post_text:
Our Open House is on Tuesday, August 20th, 2019, from 4:00 PM to 5:45 PM. Open House is an opportunity for you to come meet your child’s teachers, learn about the work we’re doing and ways to get involved in our school community. We hope to see you all! Dinner will be served from 4:00 PM to 4:45 PM.

Nuestro Open House es el Martes, 20 de Agosto, 2019 de 4:00 PM a 5:45 PM. Open House es una oportunidad para que conozca a los maestros de tu niño/a, para aprender acerca del trabajo que estamos haciendo y sobre las formas de participar en nuestra comunidad. ¡Esperamos verlos a todos! La cena sera servida de 4:00 PM a 4:45 PM.

Consulate General of France in Louisiana
December 6, 2018 at 6:00 PM ·

French artist Pablito Zago is in town to create a tricentennial mural for New Orleans! Check out his progress next time you drive past the Hartwig Moss Insurance Agency at 2626 Canal Street.
Inspired by his work, thirty middle-school students from Esperanza Charter School will work with artist Gretchen Weller Howard to use the skills they have learned in their KID smART classes to create their own mural adjacent to the large-scale work.
text:
We are always proud of our students.

Consulate General of France in Louisiana
December 6, 2018 at 6:00 PM ·

French artist Pablito Zago is in town to create a tricentennial mural for New Orleans! Check out his progress next time you drive past the Hartwig Moss Insurance Agency at 2626 Canal Street.
Inspired by his work, thirty middle-school students from Esperanza Charter School will work with artist Gretchen Weller Howard to use the skills they have learned in their KID smART classes to create their own mural adjacent to the large-scale work.

post_text:
We are thrilled to be one of the fourteen New Orleans schools named "Equity Honorees" by the Louisiana Department of Education. Esperanza Charter ranked in the top 10% statewide for demonstrating excellence in educating students with disabilities, students who are English learners, and students who are economically disadvantaged.
Congratulations to all of our students, families, teachers and staff!

Estamos emocionados de ser una de las 14 escuelas de Nueva Orleans nombradas "Homenajeados de Equidad" por el Departamento de Educación de Louisiana. Esperanza Charter fue clasificada dentro del 10% en todo el estado por demostrar excelencia educando estudiantes con discapacidad, estudiantes que son aprendices en Ingles, y estudiantes en desventaja económica.
Felicidades a todos nuestros estudiantes, familias, maestros y personal!

post_text: Congratulations to our student Daymonie for being selected among 2,500 KID smART students, as the Artist of October. Great work!
shared_text:
KID smART is with Tiana Nobile.
November 5, 2018 at 11:14 AM ·

Give a big CONGRATULATIONS to Daymonie, our Artist of October! He has been selected among 2,500 KID smART students for this recognition.

Daymonie is an 8th grader at Esperanza Charter School. In his KID smART classes, he learns math, science, social studies, and ELA through poetry and visual art.

“From our first KID smART class, Daymonie did an awesome job using shapes in his art and making a connection to what we’re learning in math.” -Daymonie's teacher, Ms. Mitchell

“Daymonie has such a unique and creative mind. It’s been a joy seeing his imagination come to life through his poems!” -KID smART teaching artist Tiana Nobile

“I love making art!” -Daymonie

Keep up the great work!

Join us for Open House this Wednesday, August 22nd, from 4:15 PM to 5:30 PM. This is an opportunity for you to learn about Esperanza and meet your child’s teachers. Dinner will be served from 4:15 to 5:00. We hope to see you and share with you.

post_text:
REMINDER:

-Open House is on Wednesday, August 22nd, 2018 from 4:15PM to 5:30 PM. Dinner will be served from 4:15 PM until 5:00 PM.

- We will have an Early Dismissal at 1:00 PM Thursday, August 9th.

Note: Every Thursday students are dismissed for 1:00 PM. We will NOT have Aftercare on Thursday 16th. The building will close for 1:30 PM.

RECORDATORIO:

-Jornada de Puertas Abiertas Miercoles, 22 de Agosto del 2018, de 4:15 PM a 5:30 PM. La cena se servirá de 4:15 PM hasta las 5:00 PM.

-Vamos a tener una salida temprana a la 1:00 PM, el Jueves 9 de Agosto.

Nota: cada Jueves, los estudiantes saldrán a la 1:00 PM. El Jueves 16 de Agosto NO HABRA cuidado de niños. El edificio cerrará a la 1:30 PM.
